description: API Update for AWS Device Farm: Support for Deals and Promotions
Load config from ~/.aws/config if AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG is set
Add support for specifying the location of the shared config file via the AWS_CONFIG_FILE environment variable. This variable is only honored if AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG is set to a truthy value.
Add support for the AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE environment variable if AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG is set
Binds response object to the data object with which successful request promises are resolved
